title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 14.2 - Limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 14.2 - Limitations

State Regulations

The investment procedures of section
14.3
of this Part are limited to
corporations of which a bank or trust company is or will become the owner of at
least a majority of the voting stock and which are controlled by no other
person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
14.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
